column4: Why cant I format my SD card. I have it mounted and its showing up in ubuntu, are you telling me I just can format the card without going to the CLI
I cant believe formatting a drive is made so un-obvious.
Do I have to format my SD card from the command line, let me guess its probably going to take like 5 commands isn't it.  One would think I would be able to just right click, format the SD card
use gparted or see man fdisk
